136 enum {
137  kAlignStartZero = 0,
138  kAlignStartSelStart,
139  kAlignStartSelEnd,
140  kAlignEndSelStart,
141  kAlignEndSelEnd,
142  // The next two are only in one subMenu, so more easily handled at the end.
143  kAlignEndToEnd,
144  kAlignTogether
145 };
146 
147 // Define functor subclasses that dispatch to the correct call sequence on
148 // member functions of AudacityProject
149 
150 using audCommandFunction = void (AudacityProject::*)();
151 class VoidFunctor final : public CommandFunctor
152 {
153 public:
154  explicit VoidFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandFunction pfn)
155  : mProject{ project }, mCommandFunction{ pfn } {}
156  void operator () (int, const wxEvent *) override
157  { (mProject->*mCommandFunction) (); }
158 private:
159  AudacityProject *const mProject;
160  const audCommandFunction mCommandFunction;
161 };
162 
163 using audCommandKeyFunction = void (AudacityProject::*)(const wxEvent *);
164 class KeyFunctor final : public CommandFunctor
165 {
166 public:
167  explicit KeyFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandKeyFunction pfn)
168  : mProject{ project }, mCommandKeyFunction{ pfn } {}
169  void operator () (int, const wxEvent *evt) override
170  { (mProject->*mCommandKeyFunction) (evt); }
171 private:
172  AudacityProject *const mProject;
173  const audCommandKeyFunction mCommandKeyFunction;
174 };
175 
176 using audCommandListFunction = void (AudacityProject::*)(int);
177 class ListFunctor final : public CommandFunctor
178 {
179 public:
180  explicit ListFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandListFunction pfn)
181  : mProject{ project }, mCommandListFunction{ pfn } {}
182  void operator () (int index, const wxEvent *) override
183  { (mProject->*mCommandListFunction)(index); }
184 private:
185  AudacityProject *const mProject;
186  const audCommandListFunction mCommandListFunction;
187 };
188 
189 using audCommandPluginFunction = bool (AudacityProject::*)(const PluginID &, int);
190 class PluginFunctor final : public CommandFunctor
191 {
192 public:
193  explicit PluginFunctor(AudacityProject *project, const PluginID &id, audCommandPluginFunction pfn)
194  : mPluginID{ id }, mProject{ project }, mCommandPluginFunction{ pfn } {}
195  void operator () (int, const wxEvent *) override
196  { (mProject->*mCommandPluginFunction) (mPluginID, AudacityProject::OnEffectFlags::kNone); }
197 private:
198  const PluginID mPluginID;
199  AudacityProject *const mProject;
200  const audCommandPluginFunction mCommandPluginFunction;
201 };
202 
203 // Now define an overloaded factory function
204 inline CommandFunctorPointer MakeFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandFunction pfn)
205 { return CommandFunctorPointer{ safenew VoidFunctor{ project, pfn } }; }
206 inline CommandFunctorPointer MakeFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandKeyFunction pfn)
207 { return CommandFunctorPointer{ safenew KeyFunctor{ project, pfn } }; }
208 inline CommandFunctorPointer MakeFunctor(AudacityProject *project, audCommandListFunction pfn)
209 { return CommandFunctorPointer{ safenew ListFunctor{ project, pfn } }; }
210 inline CommandFunctorPointer MakeFunctor(AudacityProject *project, const PluginID &id, audCommandPluginFunction pfn)
211 { return CommandFunctorPointer{ safenew PluginFunctor{ project, id, pfn } }; }
212 
213 // Now define the macro abbreviations that call the factory
214 #define FN(X) (MakeFunctor(this, &AudacityProject:: X ))
215 #define FNS(X, S) (MakeFunctor(this, (S), &AudacityProject:: X ))
216 
217 //
218 // Effects menu arrays
219 //
220 WX_DEFINE_ARRAY_PTR(const PluginDescriptor *, EffectPlugs);
221 static int SortEffectsByName(const PluginDescriptor **a, const PluginDescriptor **b)
222 {
223  wxString akey = (*a)->GetName();
224  wxString bkey = (*b)->GetName();
225 
226  akey += (*a)->GetPath();
227  bkey += (*b)->GetPath();
228 
229  return akey.CmpNoCase(bkey);
230 }
231 
232 static int SortEffectsByPublisher(const PluginDescriptor **a, const PluginDescriptor **b)
233 {
234  wxString akey = (*a)->GetVendor();
235  wxString bkey = (*b)->GetVendor();
236 
237  if (akey.IsEmpty())
238  {
239  akey = _("Uncategorized");
240  }
241  if (bkey.IsEmpty())
242  {
243  bkey = _("Uncategorized");
244  }
245 
246  akey += (*a)->GetName();
247  bkey += (*b)->GetName();
248 
249  akey += (*a)->GetPath();
250  bkey += (*b)->GetPath();
251 
252  return akey.CmpNoCase(bkey);
253 }
254 
255 static int SortEffectsByPublisherAndName(const PluginDescriptor **a, const PluginDescriptor **b)
256 {
257  wxString akey = (*a)->GetVendor();
258  wxString bkey = (*b)->GetVendor();
259 
260  if ((*a)->IsEffectDefault())
261  {
262  akey = wxEmptyString;
263  }
264  if ((*b)->IsEffectDefault())
265  {
266  bkey = wxEmptyString;
267  }
268 
269  akey += (*a)->GetName();
270  bkey += (*b)->GetName();
271 
272  akey += (*a)->GetPath();
273  bkey += (*b)->GetPath();
274 
275  return akey.CmpNoCase(bkey);
276 }
277 
278 static int SortEffectsByTypeAndName(const PluginDescriptor **a, const PluginDescriptor **b)
279 {
280  wxString akey = (*a)->GetEffectFamily();
281  wxString bkey = (*b)->GetEffectFamily();
282 
283  if (akey.IsEmpty())
284  {
285  akey = _("Uncategorized");
286  }
287  if (bkey.IsEmpty())
288  {
289  bkey = _("Uncategorized");
290  }
291 
292  if ((*a)->IsEffectDefault())
293  {
294  akey = wxEmptyString;
295  }
296  if ((*b)->IsEffectDefault())
297  {
298  bkey = wxEmptyString;
299  }
300 
301  akey += (*a)->GetName();
302  bkey += (*b)->GetName();
303 
304  akey += (*a)->GetPath();
305  bkey += (*b)->GetPath();
306 
307  return akey.CmpNoCase(bkey);
308 }
309 
310 static int SortEffectsByType(const PluginDescriptor **a, const PluginDescriptor **b)
311 {
312  wxString akey = (*a)->GetEffectFamily();
313  wxString bkey = (*b)->GetEffectFamily();
314 
315  if (akey.IsEmpty())
316  {
317  akey = _("Uncategorized");
318  }
319  if (bkey.IsEmpty())
320  {
321  bkey = _("Uncategorized");
322  }
323 
324  akey += (*a)->GetName();
325  bkey += (*b)->GetName();
326 
327  akey += (*a)->GetPath();
328  bkey += (*b)->GetPath();
329 
330  return akey.CmpNoCase(bkey);
331 }
332 
336 
337 void AudacityProject::CreateMenusAndCommands()
338 {
339  CommandManager *c = &mCommandManager;
340  wxArrayString names;
341  wxArrayInt indices;
342 
343  {
344  auto menubar = c->AddMenuBar(wxT("appmenu"));
345  wxASSERT(menubar);
346 
348  // File menu
350 
351  c->BeginMenu(_("&File"));
352  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag, AudioIONotBusyFlag);
353 
354  /*i18n-hint: "New" is an action (verb) to create a NEW project*/
355  c->AddItem(wxT("New"), _("&New"), FN(OnNew), wxT("Ctrl+N"),
356  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
357  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
358 
359  /*i18n-hint: (verb)*/
360  c->AddItem(wxT("Open"), _("&Open..."), FN(OnOpen), wxT("Ctrl+O"),
361  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
362  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
363 
365 
366  CreateRecentFilesMenu(c);
367 
369 
370  c->AddSeparator();
371 
372  c->AddItem(wxT("Close"), _("&Close"), FN(OnClose), wxT("Ctrl+W"));
373 
374  c->AddItem(wxT("Save"), _("&Save Project"), FN(OnSave), wxT("Ctrl+S"),
375  AudioIONotBusyFlag | UnsavedChangesFlag,
376  AudioIONotBusyFlag | UnsavedChangesFlag);
377  c->AddItem(wxT("SaveAs"), _("Save Project &As..."), FN(OnSaveAs));
378 #ifdef USE_LIBVORBIS
379  c->AddItem(wxT("SaveCompressed"), _("Save Compressed Copy of Project..."), FN(OnSaveCompressed));
380 #endif
381 
382  c->AddItem(wxT("CheckDeps"), _("Chec&k Dependencies..."), FN(OnCheckDependencies));
383 
384  c->AddSeparator();
385 
386  c->AddItem(wxT("EditMetaData"), _("Edit Me&tadata Tags..."), FN(OnEditMetadata));
387 
388  c->AddSeparator();
389 
391 
392  c->BeginSubMenu(_("&Import"));
393 
394  c->AddItem(wxT("ImportAudio"), _("&Audio..."), FN(OnImport), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+I"));
395  c->AddItem(wxT("ImportLabels"), _("&Labels..."), FN(OnImportLabels));
396 #ifdef USE_MIDI
397  c->AddItem(wxT("ImportMIDI"), _("&MIDI..."), FN(OnImportMIDI));
398 #endif // USE_MIDI
399  c->AddItem(wxT("ImportRaw"), _("&Raw Data..."), FN(OnImportRaw));
400 
401  c->EndSubMenu();
402 
403  c->AddSeparator();
404 
406 
407  // Enable Export audio commands only when there are audio tracks.
408  c->AddItem(wxT("Export"), _("&Export Audio..."), FN(OnExport), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+E"),
409  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag,
410  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag);
411 
412  // Enable Export Selection commands only when there's a selection.
413  c->AddItem(wxT("ExportSel"), _("Expo&rt Selected Audio..."), FN(OnExportSelection),
414  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
415  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
416 
417  c->AddItem(wxT("ExportLabels"), _("Export &Labels..."), FN(OnExportLabels),
418  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelTracksExistFlag,
419  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelTracksExistFlag);
420  // Enable Export audio commands only when there are audio tracks.
421  c->AddItem(wxT("ExportMultiple"), _("Export &Multiple..."), FN(OnExportMultiple), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+L"),
422  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag,
423  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag);
424 #if defined(USE_MIDI)
425  c->AddItem(wxT("ExportMIDI"), _("Export MIDI..."), FN(OnExportMIDI),
426  AudioIONotBusyFlag | NoteTracksSelectedFlag,
427  AudioIONotBusyFlag | NoteTracksSelectedFlag);
428 #endif
429 
430  c->AddSeparator();
431  c->AddItem(wxT("ApplyChain"), _("Appl&y Chain..."), FN(OnApplyChain),
432  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
433  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
434  c->AddItem(wxT("EditChains"), _("Edit C&hains..."), FN(OnEditChains));
435 
436  c->AddSeparator();
437 
438  c->AddItem(wxT("PageSetup"), _("Pa&ge Setup..."), FN(OnPageSetup),
439  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksExistFlag,
440  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksExistFlag);
441  /* i18n-hint: (verb) It's item on a menu. */
442  c->AddItem(wxT("Print"), _("&Print..."), FN(OnPrint),
443  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksExistFlag,
444  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksExistFlag);
445 
446  c->AddSeparator();
447 
448  // On the Mac, the Exit item doesn't actually go here...wxMac will pull it out
449  // and put it in the Audacity menu for us based on its ID.
450  /* i18n-hint: (verb) It's item on a menu. */
451  c->AddItem(wxT("Exit"), _("E&xit"), FN(OnExit), wxT("Ctrl+Q"),
452  AlwaysEnabledFlag,
453  AlwaysEnabledFlag);
454 
455  c->EndMenu();
456 
458  // Edit Menu
460 
461  c->BeginMenu(_("&Edit"));
462 
463  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | TracksSelectedFlag,
464  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | TracksSelectedFlag);
465 
466  c->AddItem(wxT("Undo"), _("&Undo"), FN(OnUndo), wxT("Ctrl+Z"),
467  AudioIONotBusyFlag | UndoAvailableFlag,
468  AudioIONotBusyFlag | UndoAvailableFlag);
469 
470  // The default shortcut key for Redo is different on different platforms.
471  wxString key =
472 #ifdef __WXMSW__
473  wxT("Ctrl+Y");
474 #else
475  wxT("Ctrl+Shift+Z");
476 #endif
477 
478  c->AddItem(wxT("Redo"), _("&Redo"), FN(OnRedo), key,
479  AudioIONotBusyFlag | RedoAvailableFlag,
480  AudioIONotBusyFlag | RedoAvailableFlag);
481 
482  ModifyUndoMenuItems();
483 
484  c->AddSeparator();
485 
486  // Basic Edit coomands
487  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
488  c->AddItem(wxT("Cut"), _("Cu&t"), FN(OnCut), wxT("Ctrl+X"),
489  AudioIONotBusyFlag | CutCopyAvailableFlag,
490  AudioIONotBusyFlag | CutCopyAvailableFlag);
491  c->AddItem(wxT("Delete"), _("&Delete"), FN(OnDelete), wxT("Ctrl+K"));
492  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
493  c->AddItem(wxT("Copy"), _("&Copy"), FN(OnCopy), wxT("Ctrl+C"),
494  AudioIONotBusyFlag | CutCopyAvailableFlag,
495  AudioIONotBusyFlag | CutCopyAvailableFlag);
496  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
497  c->AddItem(wxT("Paste"), _("&Paste"), FN(OnPaste), wxT("Ctrl+V"),
498  AudioIONotBusyFlag | ClipboardFlag,
499  AudioIONotBusyFlag | ClipboardFlag);
500  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
501  c->AddItem(wxT("Duplicate"), _("Duplic&ate"), FN(OnDuplicate), wxT("Ctrl+D"));
502 
503  c->AddSeparator();
504 
505  c->BeginSubMenu(_("R&emove Special"));
506  /* i18n-hint: (verb) Do a special kind of cut*/
507  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitCut"), _("Spl&it Cut"), FN(OnSplitCut), wxT("Ctrl+Alt+X"));
508  /* i18n-hint: (verb) Do a special kind of DELETE*/
509  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitDelete"), _("Split D&elete"), FN(OnSplitDelete), wxT("Ctrl+Alt+K"));
510 
511  c->AddSeparator();
512 
513  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
514  c->AddItem(wxT("Silence"), _("Silence Audi&o"), FN(OnSilence), wxT("Ctrl+L"),
515  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
516  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
517  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
518  c->AddItem(wxT("Trim"), _("Tri&m Audio"), FN(OnTrim), wxT("Ctrl+T"),
519  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
520  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
521  c->EndSubMenu();
522 
523  c->AddItem(wxT("PasteNewLabel"), _("Paste Te&xt to New Label"), FN(OnPasteNewLabel), wxT("Ctrl+Alt+V"),
524  AudioIONotBusyFlag, AudioIONotBusyFlag);
525 
526 
527  c->AddSeparator();
528 
530 
531  c->BeginSubMenu(_("Clip B&oundaries"));
532  /* i18n-hint: (verb) It's an item on a menu. */
533  c->AddItem(wxT("Split"), _("Sp&lit"), FN(OnSplit), wxT("Ctrl+I"),
534  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
535  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
536  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitNew"), _("Split Ne&w"), FN(OnSplitNew), wxT("Ctrl+Alt+I"),
537  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
538  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
539  c->AddSeparator();
540  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
541  c->AddItem(wxT("Join"), _("&Join"), FN(OnJoin), wxT("Ctrl+J"));
542  c->AddItem(wxT("Disjoin"), _("Detac&h at Silences"), FN(OnDisjoin), wxT("Ctrl+Alt+J"));
543  c->EndSubMenu();
544 
545  c->AddSeparator();
546 
548 
549  c->BeginSubMenu(_("La&beled Audio"));
550  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag,
551  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag);
552 
553  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
554  c->AddItem(wxT("CutLabels"), _("&Cut"), FN(OnCutLabels), wxT("Alt+X"),
555  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | IsNotSyncLockedFlag,
556  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | IsNotSyncLockedFlag);
557  c->AddItem(wxT("DeleteLabels"), _("&Delete"), FN(OnDeleteLabels), wxT("Alt+K"),
558  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | IsNotSyncLockedFlag,
559  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag | TimeSelectedFlag | IsNotSyncLockedFlag);
560 
561  c->AddSeparator();
562 
563  /* i18n-hint: (verb) A special way to cut out a piece of audio*/
564  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitCutLabels"), _("&Split Cut"), FN(OnSplitCutLabels), wxT("Alt+Shift+X"));
565  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitDeleteLabels"), _("Sp&lit Delete"), FN(OnSplitDeleteLabels), wxT("Alt+Shift+K"));
566 
567  c->AddSeparator();
568 
569 
570  c->AddItem(wxT("SilenceLabels"), _("Silence &Audio"), FN(OnSilenceLabels), wxT("Alt+L"));
571  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
572  c->AddItem(wxT("CopyLabels"), _("Co&py"), FN(OnCopyLabels), wxT("Alt+Shift+C"));
573 
574  c->AddSeparator();
575 
576  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
577  c->AddItem(wxT("SplitLabels"), _("Spli&t"), FN(OnSplitLabels), wxT("Alt+I"),
578  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag,
579  AudioIONotBusyFlag | LabelsSelectedFlag | WaveTracksExistFlag);
580  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
581  c->AddItem(wxT("JoinLabels"), _("&Join"), FN(OnJoinLabels), wxT("Alt+J"));
582  c->AddItem(wxT("DisjoinLabels"), _("Detac&h at Silences"), FN(OnDisjoinLabels), wxT("Alt+Shift+J"));
583 
584  c->EndSubMenu();
585 
587 
588  /* i18n-hint: (verb) It's an item on a menu. */
589  c->BeginSubMenu(_("&Select"));
590  c->SetDefaultFlags(TracksExistFlag, TracksExistFlag);
591 
592  c->AddItem(wxT("SelectAll"), _("&All"), FN(OnSelectAll), wxT("Ctrl+A"));
593  c->AddItem(wxT("SelectNone"), _("&None"), FN(OnSelectNone), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+A"));
594 
595 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SPECTRAL_EDITING
596  c->BeginSubMenu(_("S&pectral"));
597  c->AddItem(wxT("ToggleSpectralSelection"), _("To&ggle spectral selection"), FN(OnToggleSpectralSelection), wxT("Q"));
598  c->AddItem(wxT("NextHigherPeakFrequency"), _("Next Higher Peak Frequency"), FN(OnNextHigherPeakFrequency));
599  c->AddItem(wxT("NextLowerPeakFrequency"), _("Next Lower Peak Frequency"), FN(OnNextLowerPeakFrequency));
600  c->EndSubMenu();

605

635  c->AddItem(wxT("CursSelEnd"), _("to Selection En&d"), FN(OnCursorSelEnd));
636 
637  c->AddItem(wxT("CursTrackStart"), _("to Track &Start"), FN(OnCursorTrackStart), wxT("J"));
638  c->AddItem(wxT("CursTrackEnd"), _("to Track &End"), FN(OnCursorTrackEnd), wxT("K"));
639 
640  c->EndSubMenu();
641 
643 
644  c->AddSeparator();
645 
646  c->AddItem(wxT("SelSave"), _("Re&gion Save"), FN(OnSelectionSave),
647  WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
648  WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
649  c->AddItem(wxT("SelRestore"), _("Regio&n Restore"), FN(OnSelectionRestore),
650  TracksExistFlag,
651  TracksExistFlag);
652 
653  c->AddSeparator();
654 
656 
657  c->BeginSubMenu(_("Pla&y Region"));
658 
659  c->AddItem(wxT("LockPlayRegion"), _("&Lock"), FN(OnLockPlayRegion),
660  PlayRegionNotLockedFlag,
661  PlayRegionNotLockedFlag);
662  c->AddItem(wxT("UnlockPlayRegion"), _("&Unlock"), FN(OnUnlockPlayRegion),
663  PlayRegionLockedFlag,
664  PlayRegionLockedFlag);
665 
666  c->EndSubMenu();
667

672 #endif

675  key =
676 #ifdef __WXMAC__
677  wxT("Ctrl+,");
678 #else
679  wxT("Ctrl+P");
680 #endif
681

683  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
684  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
685

687 
689  // View Menu
691 
692  c->BeginMenu(_("&View"));
693  c->SetDefaultFlags(TracksExistFlag, TracksExistFlag);
694 
695  c->AddItem(wxT("ZoomIn"), _("Zoom &In"), FN(OnZoomIn), wxT("Ctrl+1"),
696  ZoomInAvailableFlag,
697  ZoomInAvailableFlag);
698  c->AddItem(wxT("ZoomNormal"), _("Zoom &Normal"), FN(OnZoomNormal), wxT("Ctrl+2"));
699  c->AddItem(wxT("ZoomOut"), _("Zoom &Out"), FN(OnZoomOut), wxT("Ctrl+3"),
700  ZoomOutAvailableFlag,
701  ZoomOutAvailableFlag);
702  c->AddItem(wxT("ZoomSel"), _("&Zoom to Selection"), FN(OnZoomSel), wxT("Ctrl+E"), TimeSelectedFlag, TimeSelectedFlag);
703 
704  c->AddSeparator();
705  c->AddItem(wxT("FitInWindow"), _("&Fit in Window"), FN(OnZoomFit), wxT("Ctrl+F"));
706  c->AddItem(wxT("FitV"), _("Fit &Vertically"), FN(OnZoomFitV), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+F"));
707 
708  c->AddSeparator();
709  c->AddItem(wxT("GoSelStart"), _("Go to Selection Sta&rt"), FN(OnGoSelStart), wxT("Ctrl+["), TimeSelectedFlag, TimeSelectedFlag);
710  c->AddItem(wxT("GoSelEnd"), _("Go to Selection En&d"), FN(OnGoSelEnd), wxT("Ctrl+]"), TimeSelectedFlag, TimeSelectedFlag);
711 
712  c->AddSeparator();
713  c->AddItem(wxT("CollapseAllTracks"), _("&Collapse All Tracks"), FN(OnCollapseAllTracks), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+C"));
714  c->AddItem(wxT("ExpandAllTracks"), _("E&xpand All Tracks"), FN(OnExpandAllTracks), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+X"));
715 
716  c->AddSeparator();
717  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowClipping"), _("&Show Clipping"), FN(OnShowClipping),
718  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/GUI/ShowClipping"), 0L), AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
719 
720  c->AddSeparator();
721 
722  // History window should be available either for UndoAvailableFlag or RedoAvailableFlag,
723  // but we can't make the AddItem flags and mask have both, because they'd both have to be true for the
724  // command to be enabled.
725  // If user has Undone the entire stack, RedoAvailableFlag is on but UndoAvailableFlag is off.
726  // If user has done things but not Undone anything, RedoAvailableFlag is off but UndoAvailableFlag is on.
727  // So in either of those cases, (AudioIONotBusyFlag | UndoAvailableFlag | RedoAvailableFlag) mask
728  // would fail.
729  // The only way to fix this in the current architecture is to hack in special cases for RedoAvailableFlag
730  // in AudacityProject::UpdateMenus() (ugly) and CommandManager::HandleCommandEntry() (*really* ugly --
731  // shouldn't know about particular command names and flags).
732  // Here's the hack that would be necessary in AudacityProject::UpdateMenus(), if somebody decides to do it:
733  // // Because EnableUsingFlags requires all the flag bits match the corresponding mask bits,
734  // // "UndoHistory" specifies only AudioIONotBusyFlag | UndoAvailableFlag, because that
735  // // covers the majority of cases where it should be enabled.
736  // // If history is not empty but we've Undone the whole stack, we also want to enable,
737  // // to show the Redo's on stack.
738  // // "UndoHistory" might already be enabled, but add this check for RedoAvailableFlag.
739  // if (flags & RedoAvailableFlag)
740  // mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("UndoHistory"), true);
741  // So for now, enable the command regardless of stack. It will just show empty sometimes.
742  // FOR REDESIGN, clearly there are some limitations with the flags/mask bitmaps.
743 
744  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the various editing steps that have been taken.*/
745  c->AddItem(wxT("UndoHistory"), _("&History..."), FN(OnHistory),
746  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
747  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
748 
749  c->AddItem(wxT("Karaoke"), _("&Karaoke..."), FN(OnKaraoke), LabelTracksExistFlag, LabelTracksExistFlag);
750  c->AddItem(wxT("MixerBoard"), _("&Mixer Board..."), FN(OnMixerBoard), WaveTracksExistFlag, WaveTracksExistFlag);
751 
752  c->AddSeparator();
753 
755 
756  c->BeginSubMenu(_("&Toolbars"));
757 
758  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar that manages devices*/
759  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowDeviceTB"), _("&Device Toolbar"), FN(OnShowDeviceToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
760  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar for editing*/
761  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowEditTB"), _("&Edit Toolbar"), FN(OnShowEditToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
762  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar which has sound level meters*/
763  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowMeterTB"), _("&Combined Meter Toolbar"), FN(OnShowMeterToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
764  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar with the recording level meters*/
765  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowRecordMeterTB"), _("&Recording Meter Toolbar"), FN(OnShowRecordMeterToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
766  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar with the playback level meter*/
767  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowPlayMeterTB"), _("&Playback Meter Toolbar"), FN(OnShowPlayMeterToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
768  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar with the mixer*/
769  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowMixerTB"), _("Mi&xer Toolbar"), FN(OnShowMixerToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
770  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar for selecting a time range of audio*/
771  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowSelectionTB"), _("&Selection Toolbar"), FN(OnShowSelectionToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
772 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SPECTRAL_EDITING
773  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar for selecting a frequency range of audio*/
774  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowSpectralSelectionTB"), _("&Spectral Selection Toolbar"), FN(OnShowSpectralSelectionToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
775 #endif
776  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows a toolbar that has some tools in it*/
777  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowToolsTB"), _("T&ools Toolbar"), FN(OnShowToolsToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
778  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar for transcription (currently just vary play speed)*/
779  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowTranscriptionTB"), _("Transcri&ption Toolbar"), FN(OnShowTranscriptionToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
780  /* i18n-hint: Clicking this menu item shows the toolbar with the big buttons on it (play record etc)*/
781  c->AddCheck(wxT("ShowTransportTB"), _("&Transport Toolbar"), FN(OnShowTransportToolBar), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
782 
783  c->AddSeparator();
784 
785  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
786  c->AddItem(wxT("ResetToolbars"), _("&Reset Toolbars"), FN(OnResetToolBars), 0, AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);

845  // Tracks Menu (formerly Project Menu)
847 
848  c->BeginMenu(_("&Tracks"));
849  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag, AudioIONotBusyFlag);
850 
852 
853  c->BeginSubMenu(_("Add &New"));
854 
855  c->AddItem(wxT("NewMonoTrack"), _("&Mono Track"), FN(OnNewWaveTrack), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+N"));
856  c->AddItem(wxT("NewStereoTrack"), _("&Stereo Track"), FN(OnNewStereoTrack));
857  c->AddItem(wxT("NewLabelTrack"), _("&Label Track"), FN(OnNewLabelTrack));
858  c->AddItem(wxT("NewTimeTrack"), _("&Time Track"), FN(OnNewTimeTrack));
859 
860  c->EndSubMenu();
861 
863 
864  c->AddSeparator();
865 
866  {
867  // Stereo to Mono is an oddball command that is also subject to control by the
868  // plug-in manager, as if an effect. Decide whether to show or hide it.
869  const PluginID ID = EffectManager::Get().GetEffectByIdentifier(wxT("StereoToMono"));
870  const PluginDescriptor *plug = PluginManager::Get().GetPlugin(ID);
871  if (plug)
872  c->AddItem(wxT("Stereo to Mono"), _("Stereo Trac&k to Mono"), FN(OnStereoToMono),
873  AudioIONotBusyFlag | StereoRequiredFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
874  AudioIONotBusyFlag | StereoRequiredFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
875  }
876  c->AddItem(wxT("MixAndRender"), _("Mi&x and Render"), FN(OnMixAndRender),
877  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
878  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
879  c->AddItem(wxT("MixAndRenderToNewTrack"), _("Mix and Render to Ne&w Track"), FN(OnMixAndRenderToNewTrack), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+M"),
880  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
881  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
882  c->AddItem(wxT("Resample"), _("&Resample..."), FN(OnResample),
883  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag,
884  AudioIONotBusyFlag | WaveTracksSelectedFlag);
885 
886  c->AddSeparator();
887 
888  c->AddItem(wxT("RemoveTracks"), _("Remo&ve Tracks"), FN(OnRemoveTracks),
889  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag,
890  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag);
891 
892  c->AddSeparator();
893 
894  c->AddItem(wxT("MuteAllTracks"), _("&Mute All Tracks"), FN(OnMuteAllTracks), wxT("Ctrl+U"));
895  c->AddItem(wxT("UnMuteAllTracks"), _("&Unmute All Tracks"), FN(OnUnMuteAllTracks), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+U"));
896 
897  c->AddSeparator();
898 
899  wxArrayString alignLabelsNoSync;
900  alignLabelsNoSync.Add(_("&Align End to End"));
901  alignLabelsNoSync.Add(_("Align &Together"));
902 
903  wxArrayString alignLabels;
904  alignLabels.Add(_("Start to &Zero"));
905  alignLabels.Add(_("Start to &Cursor/Selection Start"));
906  alignLabels.Add(_("Start to Selection &End"));
907  alignLabels.Add(_("End to Cu&rsor/Selection Start"));
908  alignLabels.Add(_("End to Selection En&d"));
909  mAlignLabelsCount = alignLabels.GetCount();
910 
911  // Calling c->SetCommandFlags() after AddItemList for "Align" and "AlignMove"
912  // does not correctly set flags for submenus, so do it this way.
913  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag,
914  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag);
915 
916  c->BeginSubMenu(_("&Align Tracks"));
917 
918  c->AddItemList(wxT("Align"), alignLabelsNoSync, FN(OnAlignNoSync));
919  c->AddSeparator();
920  c->AddItemList(wxT("Align"), alignLabels, FN(OnAlign));
921 
922  c->EndSubMenu();
923 
925 
926  // TODO: Can these labels be made clearer? Do we need this sub-menu at all?
927  c->BeginSubMenu(_("Move Sele&ction when Aligning"));
928 
929  c->AddItemList(wxT("AlignMove"), alignLabels, FN(OnAlignMoveSel));
930  c->SetCommandFlags(wxT("AlignMove"),
931  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag,
932  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag);
933 
934  c->EndSubMenu();
935  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIONotBusyFlag, AudioIONotBusyFlag);
936 
937

950  AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);

953 #endif

1020  EffectManager::Get().GetEffectName(mLastEffect).c_str());
1021  }
1022  else
1023  buildMenuLabel.Printf(_("Repeat Last Effect"));

1119  c->AddGlobalCommand(wxT("PrevWindow"), _("Move backward thru active windows"), FN(PrevWindow), wxT("Alt+Shift+F6"));
1120  c->AddGlobalCommand(wxT("NextWindow"), _("Move forward thru active windows"), FN(NextWindow), wxT("Alt+F6"));
1121 
1122  c->SetDefaultFlags(AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
1123 
1124  c->AddCommand(wxT("PrevFrame"), _("Move backward from toolbars to tracks"), FN(PrevFrame), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+F6"));
1125  c->AddCommand(wxT("NextFrame"), _("Move forward from toolbars to tracks"), FN(NextFrame), wxT("Ctrl+F6"));
1126 
1127  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelectTool"), _("Selection Tool"), FN(OnSelectTool), wxT("F1"));
1128  c->AddCommand(wxT("EnvelopeTool"),_("Envelope Tool"), FN(OnEnvelopeTool), wxT("F2"));
1129  c->AddCommand(wxT("DrawTool"), _("Draw Tool"), FN(OnDrawTool), wxT("F3"));
1130  c->AddCommand(wxT("ZoomTool"), _("Zoom Tool"), FN(OnZoomTool), wxT("F4"));
1131  c->AddCommand(wxT("TimeShiftTool"), _("Time Shift Tool"), FN(OnTimeShiftTool), wxT("F5"));
1132  c->AddCommand(wxT("MultiTool"), _("Multi Tool"), FN(OnMultiTool), wxT("F6"));
1133 
1134  c->AddCommand(wxT("NextTool"), _("Next Tool"), FN(OnNextTool), wxT("D"));
1135  c->AddCommand(wxT("PrevTool"), _("Previous Tool"), FN(OnPrevTool), wxT("A"));
1136  /* i18n-hint: (verb) Start playing audio*/
1137  c->AddCommand(wxT("Play"), _("Play"), FN(OnPlayStop),
1138  WaveTracksExistFlag | AudioIONotBusyFlag,
1139  WaveTracksExistFlag | AudioIONotBusyFlag);
1140  /* i18n-hint: (verb) Stop playing audio*/
1141  c->AddCommand(wxT("Stop"), _("Stop"), FN(OnStop),
1142  AudioIOBusyFlag,
1143  AudioIOBusyFlag);
1144 
1145  c->SetDefaultFlags(CaptureNotBusyFlag, CaptureNotBusyFlag);
1146 
1147  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayOneSec"), _("Play One Second"), FN(OnPlayOneSecond), wxT("1"),
1148  CaptureNotBusyFlag,
1149  CaptureNotBusyFlag);
1150  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayToSelection"),_("Play To Selection"), FN(OnPlayToSelection), wxT("B"),
1151  CaptureNotBusyFlag,
1152  CaptureNotBusyFlag);
1153  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayBeforeSelectionStart"),_("Play Before Selection Start"), FN(OnPlayBeforeSelectionStart), wxT("Shift+F5"));
1154  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayAfterSelectionStart"),_("Play After Selection Start"), FN(OnPlayAfterSelectionStart), wxT("Shift+F6"));
1155  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayBeforeSelectionEnd"),_("Play Before Selection End"), FN(OnPlayBeforeSelectionEnd), wxT("Shift+F7"));
1156  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayAfterSelectionEnd"),_("Play After Selection End"), FN(OnPlayAfterSelectionEnd), wxT("Shift+F8"));
1157  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionStart"),_("Play Before and After Selection Start"), FN(OnPlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionStart), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+F5"));
1158  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionEnd"),_("Play Before and After Selection End"), FN(OnPlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionEnd), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+F7"));
1159  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayCutPreview"), _("Play Cut Preview"), FN(OnPlayCutPreview), wxT("C"),
1160  CaptureNotBusyFlag,
1161  CaptureNotBusyFlag);
1162 
1163  c->SetDefaultFlags(AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
1164 
1165 
1166  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelStart"), _("Selection to Start"), FN(OnSelToStart), wxT("Shift+Home"));
1167  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelEnd"), _("Selection to End"), FN(OnSelToEnd), wxT("Shift+End"));
1168 
1169  c->AddCommand(wxT("DeleteKey"), _("DeleteKey"), FN(OnDelete), wxT("Backspace"),
1170  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag | TimeSelectedFlag,
1171  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag | TimeSelectedFlag);
1172 
1173  c->AddCommand(wxT("DeleteKey2"), _("DeleteKey2"), FN(OnDelete), wxT("Delete"),
1174  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag | TimeSelectedFlag,
1175  AudioIONotBusyFlag | TracksSelectedFlag | TimeSelectedFlag);
1176 
1177  c->SetDefaultFlags(AudioIOBusyFlag, AudioIOBusyFlag);
1178 
1179  c->AddCommand(wxT("SeekLeftShort"), _("Short seek left during playback"), FN(OnSeekLeftShort), wxT("Left\tallowDup"));
1180  c->AddCommand(wxT("SeekRightShort"),_("Short seek right during playback"), FN(OnSeekRightShort), wxT("Right\tallowDup"));
1181  c->AddCommand(wxT("SeekLeftLong"), _("Long seek left during playback"), FN(OnSeekLeftLong), wxT("Shift+Left\tallowDup"));
1182  c->AddCommand(wxT("SeekRightLong"), _("Long Seek right during playback"), FN(OnSeekRightLong), wxT("Shift+Right\tallowDup"));
1183 
1184  c->SetDefaultFlags(TracksExistFlag | TrackPanelHasFocus,
1185  TracksExistFlag | TrackPanelHasFocus);
1186 
1187  c->AddCommand(wxT("PrevTrack"), _("Move Focus to Previous Track"), FN(OnCursorUp), wxT("Up"));
1188  c->AddCommand(wxT("NextTrack"), _("Move Focus to Next Track"), FN(OnCursorDown), wxT("Down"));
1189  c->AddCommand(wxT("FirstTrack"), _("Move Focus to First Track"), FN(OnFirstTrack), wxT("Ctrl+Home"));
1190  c->AddCommand(wxT("LastTrack"), _("Move Focus to Last Track"), FN(OnLastTrack), wxT("Ctrl+End"));
1191 
1192 
1193  c->AddCommand(wxT("ShiftUp"), _("Move Focus to Previous and Select"), FN(OnShiftUp), wxT("Shift+Up"));
1194  c->AddCommand(wxT("ShiftDown"), _("Move Focus to Next and Select"), FN(OnShiftDown), wxT("Shift+Down"));
1195  c->AddCommand(wxT("Toggle"), _("Toggle Focused Track"), FN(OnToggle), wxT("Return"));
1196  c->AddCommand(wxT("ToggleAlt"), _("Toggle Focused Track"), FN(OnToggle), wxT("NUMPAD_ENTER"));
1197 
1198  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorLeft"), _("Cursor Left"), FN(OnCursorLeft), wxT("Left\twantKeyup\tallowDup"));
1199  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorRight"), _("Cursor Right"), FN(OnCursorRight), wxT("Right\twantKeyup\tallowDup"));
1200  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorShortJumpLeft"), _("Cursor Short Jump Left"), FN(OnCursorShortJumpLeft), wxT(","));
1201  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorShortJumpRight"), _("Cursor Short Jump Right"), FN(OnCursorShortJumpRight), wxT("."));
1202  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorLongJumpLeft"), _("Cursor Long Jump Left"), FN(OnCursorLongJumpLeft), wxT("Shift+,"));
1203  c->AddCommand(wxT("CursorLongJumpRight"), _("Cursor Long Jump Right"), FN(OnCursorLongJumpRight), wxT("Shift+."));
1204 
1205  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelExtLeft"), _("Selection Extend Left"), FN(OnSelExtendLeft), wxT("Shift+Left\twantKeyup\tallowDup"));
1206  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelExtRight"), _("Selection Extend Right"), FN(OnSelExtendRight), wxT("Shift+Right\twantKeyup\tallowDup"));
1207 
1208  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelSetExtLeft"), _("Set (or Extend) Left Selection"), FN(OnSelSetExtendLeft));
1209  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelSetExtRight"), _("Set (or Extend) Right Selection"), FN(OnSelSetExtendRight));
1210 
1211  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelCntrLeft"), _("Selection Contract Left"), FN(OnSelContractLeft), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+Right\twantKeyup"));
1212  c->AddCommand(wxT("SelCntrRight"), _("Selection Contract Right"), FN(OnSelContractRight), wxT("Ctrl+Shift+Left\twantKeyup"));
1213 
1214  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackPan"), _("Change pan on focused track"), FN(OnTrackPan), wxT("Shift+P"));
1215  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackPanLeft"), _("Pan left on focused track"), FN(OnTrackPanLeft), wxT("Alt+Shift+Left"));
1216  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackPanRight"), _("Pan right on focused track"), FN(OnTrackPanRight), wxT("Alt+Shift+Right"));
1217  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackGain"), _("Change gain on focused track"), FN(OnTrackGain), wxT("Shift+G"));
1218  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackGainInc"), _("Increase gain on focused track"), FN(OnTrackGainInc), wxT("Alt+Shift+Up"));
1219  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackGainDec"), _("Decrease gain on focused track"), FN(OnTrackGainDec), wxT("Alt+Shift+Down"));
1220  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMenu"), _("Open menu on focused track"), FN(OnTrackMenu), wxT("Shift+M\tskipKeydown"));
1221  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMute"), _("Mute/Unmute focused track"), FN(OnTrackMute), wxT("Shift+U"));
1222  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackSolo"), _("Solo/Unsolo focused track"), FN(OnTrackSolo), wxT("Shift+S"));
1223  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackClose"), _("Close focused track"), FN(OnTrackClose), wxT("Shift+C"));
1224  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMoveUp"), _("Move focused track up"), FN(OnTrackMoveUp));
1225  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMoveDown"), _("Move focused track down"), FN(OnTrackMoveDown));
1226  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMoveTop"), _("Move focused track to top"), FN(OnTrackMoveTop));
1227  c->AddCommand(wxT("TrackMoveBottom"), _("Move focused track to bottom"), FN(OnTrackMoveBottom));
1228 
1229  c->SetDefaultFlags(AlwaysEnabledFlag, AlwaysEnabledFlag);
1230 
1231  c->AddCommand(wxT("SnapToOff"), _("Snap To Off"), FN(OnSnapToOff));
1232  c->AddCommand(wxT("SnapToNearest"), _("Snap To Nearest"), FN(OnSnapToNearest));
1233  c->AddCommand(wxT("SnapToPrior"), _("Snap To Prior"), FN(OnSnapToPrior));
1234 
1235  c->AddCommand(wxT("FullScreenOnOff"), _("Full screen on/off"), FN(OnFullScreen),
1236 #ifdef __WXMAC__
1237  wxT("Ctrl+/"));
1238 #else
1239  wxT("F11"));
1240 #endif
1241 
1242  c->AddCommand(wxT("InputDevice"), _("Change recording device"), FN(OnInputDevice), wxT("Shift+I"),
1243  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
1244  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
1245  c->AddCommand(wxT("OutputDevice"), _("Change playback device"), FN(OnOutputDevice), wxT("Shift+O"),
1246  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
1247  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
1248  c->AddCommand(wxT("AudioHost"), _("Change audio host"), FN(OnAudioHost), wxT("Shift+H"),
1249  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
1250  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
1251  c->AddCommand(wxT("InputChannels"), _("Change recording channels"), FN(OnInputChannels), wxT("Shift+N"),
1252  AudioIONotBusyFlag,
1253  AudioIONotBusyFlag);
1254 
1255  c->AddCommand(wxT("OutputGain"), _("Adjust playback volume"), FN(OnOutputGain));
1256  c->AddCommand(wxT("OutputGainInc"), _("Increase playback volume"), FN(OnOutputGainInc));
1257  c->AddCommand(wxT("OutputGainDec"), _("Decrease playback volume"), FN(OnOutputGainDec));
1258  c->AddCommand(wxT("InputGain"), _("Adjust recording volume"), FN(OnInputGain));
1259  c->AddCommand(wxT("InputGainInc"), _("Increase recording volume"), FN(OnInputGainInc));
1260  c->AddCommand(wxT("InputGainDec"), _("Decrease recording volume"), FN(OnInputGainDec));
1261 
1262  c->SetDefaultFlags(CaptureNotBusyFlag, CaptureNotBusyFlag);
1263 
1264  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayAtSpeed"), _("Play at speed"), FN(OnPlayAtSpeed));
1265  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayAtSpeedLooped"), _("Loop Play at speed"), FN(OnPlayAtSpeedLooped));
1266  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlayAtSpeedCutPreview"), _("Play Cut Preview at speed"), FN(OnPlayAtSpeedCutPreview));
1267  c->AddCommand(wxT("SetPlaySpeed"), _("Adjust playback speed"), FN(OnSetPlaySpeed));
1268  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlaySpeedInc"), _("Increase playback speed"), FN(OnPlaySpeedInc));
1269  c->AddCommand(wxT("PlaySpeedDec"), _("Decrease playback speed"), FN(OnPlaySpeedDec));
1270 
1271  mLastFlags = 0;
1272 
1273 #if defined(__WXDEBUG__)
1274 // c->CheckDups();
1275 #endif
1276 }
1277 
1278 void AudacityProject::PopulateEffectsMenu(CommandManager* c,
1279  EffectType type,
1280  int batchflags,
1281  int realflags)
1282 {
1283  PluginManager & pm = PluginManager::Get();
1284 
1285  EffectPlugs defplugs;
1286  EffectPlugs optplugs;
1287 
1288  const PluginDescriptor *plug = pm.GetFirstPluginForEffectType(type);
1289  while (plug)
1290  {
1291  if ( !plug->IsEnabled() ){
1292  ;// don't add to menus!
1293  }
1294  else if (plug->IsEffectDefault())
1295  {
1296  defplugs.Add(plug);
1297  }
1298  else
1299  {
1300  optplugs.Add(plug);
1301  }
1302  plug = pm.GetNextPluginForEffectType(type);
1303  }
1304 
1305  wxString groupby = gPrefs->Read(wxT("/Effects/GroupBy"), wxT("name"));
1306 
1307  if (groupby == wxT("sortby:name"))
1308  {
1309  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1310  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1311  }
1312  else if (groupby == wxT("sortby:publisher:name"))
1313  {
1314  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1315  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByPublisherAndName);
1316  }
1317  else if (groupby == wxT("sortby:type:name"))
1318  {
1319  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1320  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByTypeAndName);
1321  }
1322  else if (groupby == wxT("groupby:publisher"))
1323  {
1324  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByPublisher);
1325  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByPublisher);
1326  }
1327  else if (groupby == wxT("groupby:type"))
1328  {
1329  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByType);
1330  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByType);
1331  }
1332  else // name
1333  {
1334  defplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1335  optplugs.Sort(SortEffectsByName);
1336  }
1337 
1338  AddEffectMenuItems(c, defplugs, batchflags, realflags, true);
1339 
1340  if (defplugs.GetCount() && optplugs.GetCount())
1341  {
1342  c->AddSeparator();
1343  }
1344 
1345  AddEffectMenuItems(c, optplugs, batchflags, realflags, false);
1346 
1347  return;
1348 }
1349 
1350 void AudacityProject::AddEffectMenuItems(CommandManager *c,
1351  EffectPlugs & plugs,
1352  int batchflags,
1353  int realflags,
1354  bool isDefault)
1355 {
1356  size_t pluginCnt = plugs.GetCount();
1357 
1358  wxString groupBy = gPrefs->Read(wxT("/Effects/GroupBy"), wxT("name"));
1359 
1360  bool grouped = false;
1361  if (groupBy.StartsWith(wxT("groupby")))
1362  {
1363  grouped = true;
1364  }
1365 
1366  wxArrayString groupNames;
1367  PluginIDList groupPlugs;
1368  wxArrayInt groupFlags;
1369  if (grouped)
1370  {
1371  wxString last;
1372  wxString current;
1373 
1374  for (size_t i = 0; i < pluginCnt; i++)
1375  {
1376  const PluginDescriptor *plug = plugs[i];
1377 
1378  wxString name = plug->GetName();
1379 
1380  if (plug->IsEffectInteractive())
1381  {
1382  name += wxT("...");
1383  }
1384 
1385  if (groupBy == wxT("groupby:publisher"))
1386  {
1387  current = plug->GetVendor();
1388  if (current.IsEmpty())
1389  {
1390  current = _("Unknown");
1391  }
1392  }
1393  else if (groupBy == wxT("groupby:type"))
1394  {
1395  current = plug->GetEffectFamily();
1396  if (current.IsEmpty())
1397  {
1398  current = _("Unknown");
1399  }
1400  }
1401 
1402  if (current != last)
1403  {
1404  if (!last.IsEmpty())
1405  {
1406  c->BeginSubMenu(last);
1407  }
1408 
1409  AddEffectMenuItemGroup(c, groupNames, groupPlugs, groupFlags, isDefault);
1410 
1411  if (!last.IsEmpty())
1412  {
1413  c->EndSubMenu();
1414  }
1415 
1416  groupNames.Clear();
1417  groupPlugs.Clear();
1418  groupFlags.Clear();
1419  last = current;
1420  }
1421 
1422  groupNames.Add(name);
1423  groupPlugs.Add(plug->GetID());
1424  groupFlags.Add(plug->IsEffectRealtime() ? realflags : batchflags);
1425  }
1426 
1427  if (groupNames.GetCount() > 0)
1428  {
1429  c->BeginSubMenu(current);
1430 
1431  AddEffectMenuItemGroup(c, groupNames, groupPlugs, groupFlags, isDefault);
1432 
1433  c->EndSubMenu();
1434  }
1435  }
1436  else
1437  {
1438  for (size_t i = 0; i < pluginCnt; i++)
1439  {
1440  const PluginDescriptor *plug = plugs[i];
1441 
1442  wxString name = plug->GetName();
1443 
1444  if (plug->IsEffectInteractive())
1445  {
1446  name += wxT("...");
1447  }
1448 
1449  wxString group = wxEmptyString;
1450  if (groupBy == wxT("sortby:publisher:name"))
1451  {
1452  group = plug->GetVendor();
1453  }
1454  else if (groupBy == wxT("sortby:type:name"))
1455  {
1456  group = plug->GetEffectFamily();
1457  }
1458 
1459  if (plug->IsEffectDefault())
1460  {
1461  group = wxEmptyString;
1462  }
1463 
1464  if (!group.IsEmpty())
1465  {
1466  group += wxT(": ");
1467  }
1468 
1469  groupNames.Add(group + name);
1470  groupPlugs.Add(plug->GetID());
1471  groupFlags.Add(plug->IsEffectRealtime() ? realflags : batchflags);
1472  }
1473 
1474  if (groupNames.GetCount() > 0)
1475  {
1476  AddEffectMenuItemGroup(c, groupNames, groupPlugs, groupFlags, isDefault);
1477  }
1478 
1479  }
1480 
1481  return;
1482 }
1483 
1484 void AudacityProject::AddEffectMenuItemGroup(CommandManager *c,
1485  const wxArrayString & names,
1486  const PluginIDList & plugs,
1487  const wxArrayInt & flags,
1488  bool isDefault)
1489 {
1490  int namesCnt = (int) names.GetCount();
1491  int perGroup;
1492 
1493 #if defined(__WXGTK__)
1494  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/Effects/MaxPerGroup"), &perGroup, 15);
1495 #else
1496  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/Effects/MaxPerGroup"), &perGroup, 0);
1497 #endif
1498 
1499  int groupCnt = namesCnt;
1500  for (int i = 0; i < namesCnt; i++)
1501  {
1502  while (i + 1 < namesCnt && names[i].IsSameAs(names[i + 1]))
1503  {
1504  i++;
1505  groupCnt--;
1506  }
1507  }
1508 
1509  // The "default" effects shouldn't be broken into subgroups
1510  if (namesCnt > 0 && isDefault)
1511  {
1512  perGroup = 0;
1513  }
1514 
1515  int max = perGroup;
1516  int items = perGroup;
1517 
1518  if (max > groupCnt)
1519  {
1520  max = 0;
1521  }
1522 
1523  int groupNdx = 0;
1524  for (int i = 0; i < namesCnt; i++)
1525  {
1526  if (max > 0 && items == max)
1527  {
1528  int end = groupNdx + max;
1529  if (end + 1 > groupCnt)
1530  {
1531  end = groupCnt;
1532  }
1533  c->BeginSubMenu(wxString::Format(_("Plug-ins %d to %d"),
1534  groupNdx + 1,
1535  end));
1536  }
1537 
1538  if (i + 1 < namesCnt && names[i].IsSameAs(names[i + 1]))
1539  {
1540  wxString name = names[i];
1541  c->BeginSubMenu(name);
1542  while (i < namesCnt && names[i].IsSameAs(name))
1543  {
1544  wxString item = PluginManager::Get().GetPlugin(plugs[i])->GetPath();
1545  c->AddItem(item,
1546  item,
1547  FNS(OnEffect, plugs[i]),
1548  flags[i],
1549  flags[i]);
1550 
1551  i++;
1552  }
1553  c->EndSubMenu();
1554  i--;
1555  }
1556  else
1557  {
1558  c->AddItem(names[i],
1559  names[i],
1560  FNS(OnEffect, plugs[i]),
1561  flags[i],
1562  flags[i]);
1563  }
1564 
1565  if (max > 0)
1566  {
1567  groupNdx++;
1568  items--;
1569  if (items == 0 || i + 1 == namesCnt)
1570  {
1571  c->EndSubMenu();
1572  items = max;
1573  }
1574  }
1575  }
1576 
1577  return;
1578 }
1579 
1580 void AudacityProject::CreateRecentFilesMenu(CommandManager *c)
1581 {
1582  // Recent Files and Recent Projects menus
1583 
1584 #ifdef __WXMAC__
1585  /* i18n-hint: This is the name of the menu item on Mac OS X only */
1586  mRecentFilesMenu = c->BeginSubMenu(_("Open Recent"));
1587 #else
1588  /* i18n-hint: This is the name of the menu item on Windows and Linux */
1589  mRecentFilesMenu = c->BeginSubMenu(_("Recent &Files"));
1590 #endif
1591 
1592  wxGetApp().GetRecentFiles()->UseMenu(mRecentFilesMenu);
1593  wxGetApp().GetRecentFiles()->AddFilesToMenu(mRecentFilesMenu);
1594 
1595  c->EndSubMenu();
1596 
1597 }
1598 
1599 void AudacityProject::ModifyUndoMenuItems()
1600 {
1601  wxString desc;
1602  int cur = GetUndoManager()->GetCurrentState();
1603 
1604  if (GetUndoManager()->UndoAvailable()) {
1605  GetUndoManager()->GetShortDescription(cur, &desc);
1606  mCommandManager.Modify(wxT("Undo"),
1607  wxString::Format(_("&Undo %s"),
1608  desc.c_str()));
1609  }
1610  else {
1611  mCommandManager.Modify(wxT("Undo"),
1612  wxString::Format(_("&Undo")));
1613  }
1614 
1615  if (GetUndoManager()->RedoAvailable()) {
1616  GetUndoManager()->GetShortDescription(cur+1, &desc);
1617  mCommandManager.Modify(wxT("Redo"),
1618  wxString::Format(_("&Redo %s"),
1619  desc.c_str()));
1620  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Redo"), true);
1621  }
1622  else {
1623  mCommandManager.Modify(wxT("Redo"),
1624  wxString::Format(_("&Redo")));
1625  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Redo"), false);
1626  }
1627 }
1628 
1629 void AudacityProject::RebuildMenuBar()
1630 {
1631  // On OSX, we can't rebuild the menus while a modal dialog is being shown
1632  // since the enabled state for menus like Quit and Preference gets out of
1633  // sync with wxWidgets idea of what it should be.
1634 #if defined(__WXMAC__) && defined(__WXDEBUG__)
1635  {
1636  wxDialog *dlg = wxDynamicCast(wxGetTopLevelParent(FindFocus()), wxDialog);
1637  wxASSERT((!dlg || !dlg->IsModal()));
1638  }
1639 #endif
1640 
1641  // Allow FileHistory to remove its own menu
1642  wxGetApp().GetRecentFiles()->RemoveMenu(mRecentFilesMenu);
1643 
1644  // Delete the menus, since we will soon recreate them.
1645  // Rather oddly, the menus don't vanish as a result of doing this.
1646  {
1647  std::unique_ptr<wxMenuBar> menuBar{ GetMenuBar() };
1648  DetachMenuBar();
1649  // menuBar gets deleted here
1650  }
1651 
1652  mCommandManager.PurgeData();
1653 
1654  CreateMenusAndCommands();
1655 
1656  ModuleManager::Get().Dispatch(MenusRebuilt);
1657 }
1658 
1659 void AudacityProject::RebuildOtherMenus()
1660 {
1661  if (mTrackPanel) {
1662  mTrackPanel->BuildMenus();
1663  }
1664 }
1665 
1666 int AudacityProject::GetFocusedFrame()
1667 {
1668  wxWindow *w = FindFocus();
1669 
1670  while (w && mToolManager && mTrackPanel) {
1671  if (w == mToolManager->GetTopDock()) {
1672  return TopDockHasFocus;
1673  }
1674 
1675  if (w == mTrackPanel) {
1676  return TrackPanelHasFocus;
1677  }
1678 
1679  if (w == mToolManager->GetBotDock()) {
1680  return BotDockHasFocus;
1681  }
1682 
1683  w = w->GetParent();
1684  }
1685 
1686  return 0;
1687 }
1688 
1689 wxUint32 AudacityProject::GetUpdateFlags()
1690 {
1691  // This method determines all of the flags that determine whether
1692  // certain menu items and commands should be enabled or disabled,
1693  // and returns them in a bitfield. Note that if none of the flags
1694  // have changed, it's not necessary to even check for updates.
1695  wxUint32 flags = 0;
1696 
1697  if (!gAudioIO->IsAudioTokenActive(GetAudioIOToken()))
1698  flags |= AudioIONotBusyFlag;
1699  else
1700  flags |= AudioIOBusyFlag;
1701 
1702  if (!mViewInfo.selectedRegion.isPoint())
1703  flags |= TimeSelectedFlag;
1704 
1705  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
1706  Track *t = iter.First();
1707  while (t) {
1708  flags |= TracksExistFlag;
1709  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Label) {
1710  LabelTrack *lt = (LabelTrack *) t;
1711 
1712  flags |= LabelTracksExistFlag;
1713 
1714  if (lt->GetSelected()) {
1715  flags |= TracksSelectedFlag;
1716  for (int i = 0; i < lt->GetNumLabels(); i++) {
1717  const LabelStruct *ls = lt->GetLabel(i);
1718  if (ls->getT0() >= mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0() &&
1719  ls->getT1() <= mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1()) {
1720  flags |= LabelsSelectedFlag;
1721  break;
1722  }
1723  }
1724  }
1725 
1726  if (lt->IsTextSelected()) {
1727  flags |= CutCopyAvailableFlag;
1728  }
1729  }
1730  else if (t->GetKind() == Track::Wave) {
1731  flags |= WaveTracksExistFlag;
1732  if (t->GetSelected()) {
1733  flags |= TracksSelectedFlag;
1734  if (t->GetLinked()) {
1735  flags |= StereoRequiredFlag;
1736  }
1737  else {
1738  flags |= WaveTracksSelectedFlag;
1739  }
1740  }
1741  }
1742 #if defined(USE_MIDI)
1743  else if (t->GetKind() == Track::Note) {
1744  NoteTrack *nt = (NoteTrack *) t;
1745 
1746  flags |= NoteTracksExistFlag;
1747 
1748  if (nt->GetSelected()) {
1749  flags |= TracksSelectedFlag;
1750  flags |= NoteTracksSelectedFlag;
1751  }
1752  }
1753 #endif
1754  t = iter.Next();
1755  }
1756 
1757  if((msClipT1 - msClipT0) > 0.0)
1758  flags |= ClipboardFlag;
1759 
1760  if (GetUndoManager()->UnsavedChanges())
1761  flags |= UnsavedChangesFlag;
1762 
1763  if (!mLastEffect.IsEmpty())
1764  flags |= HasLastEffectFlag;
1765 
1766  if (GetUndoManager()->UndoAvailable())
1767  flags |= UndoAvailableFlag;
1768 
1769  if (GetUndoManager()->RedoAvailable())
1770  flags |= RedoAvailableFlag;
1771 
1772  if (ZoomInAvailable() && (flags & TracksExistFlag))
1773  flags |= ZoomInAvailableFlag;
1774 
1775  if (ZoomOutAvailable() && (flags & TracksExistFlag))
1776  flags |= ZoomOutAvailableFlag;
1777 
1778  if ((flags & LabelTracksExistFlag) && LabelTrack::IsTextClipSupported())
1779  flags |= TextClipFlag;
1780 
1781  flags |= GetFocusedFrame();
1782 
1783  double start, end;
1784  GetPlayRegion(&start, &end);
1785  if (IsPlayRegionLocked())
1786  flags |= PlayRegionLockedFlag;
1787  else if (start != end)
1788  flags |= PlayRegionNotLockedFlag;
1789 
1790  if (flags & AudioIONotBusyFlag) {
1791  if (flags & TimeSelectedFlag) {
1792  if (flags & TracksSelectedFlag) {
1793  flags |= CutCopyAvailableFlag;
1794  }
1795  }
1796  }
1797 
1798  if (wxGetApp().GetRecentFiles()->GetCount() > 0)
1799  flags |= HaveRecentFiles;
1800 
1801  if (IsSyncLocked())
1802  flags |= IsSyncLockedFlag;
1803  else
1804  flags |= IsNotSyncLockedFlag;
1805 
1806  if (!EffectManager::Get().RealtimeIsActive())
1807  flags |= IsRealtimeNotActiveFlag;
1808 
1809  if (!mIsCapturing)
1810  flags |= CaptureNotBusyFlag;
1811 
1812  return flags;
1813 }
1814 
1815 void AudacityProject::SelectAllIfNone()
1816 {
1817  wxUint32 flags = GetUpdateFlags();
1818  if(((flags & TracksSelectedFlag) ==0) ||
1819  (mViewInfo.selectedRegion.isPoint()))
1820  OnSelectAll();
1821 }
1822 
1823 void AudacityProject::ModifyAllProjectToolbarMenus()
1824 {
1825  AProjectArray::iterator i;
1826  for (i = gAudacityProjects.begin(); i != gAudacityProjects.end(); ++i) {
1827  ((AudacityProject *)*i)->ModifyToolbarMenus();
1828  }
1829 }
1830 
1831 void AudacityProject::ModifyToolbarMenus()
1832 {
1833  // Refreshes can occur during shutdown and the toolmanager may already
1834  // be deleted, so protect against it.
1835  if (!mToolManager) {
1836  return;
1837  }
1838 
1839  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowDeviceTB"),
1840  mToolManager->IsVisible(DeviceBarID));
1841  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowEditTB"),
1842  mToolManager->IsVisible(EditBarID));
1843  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowMeterTB"),
1844  mToolManager->IsVisible(MeterBarID));
1845  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowRecordMeterTB"),
1846  mToolManager->IsVisible(RecordMeterBarID));
1847  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowPlayMeterTB"),
1848  mToolManager->IsVisible(PlayMeterBarID));
1849  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowMixerTB"),
1850  mToolManager->IsVisible(MixerBarID));
1851  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowSelectionTB"),
1852  mToolManager->IsVisible(SelectionBarID));
1853 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SPECTRAL_EDITING
1854  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowSpectralSelectionTB"),
1855  mToolManager->IsVisible(SpectralSelectionBarID));
1856 #endif
1857  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowToolsTB"),
1858  mToolManager->IsVisible(ToolsBarID));
1859  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowTranscriptionTB"),
1860  mToolManager->IsVisible(TranscriptionBarID));
1861  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("ShowTransportTB"),
1862  mToolManager->IsVisible(TransportBarID));
1863 
1864  // Now, go through each toolbar, and call EnableDisableButtons()
1865  for (int i = 0; i < ToolBarCount; i++) {
1866  mToolManager->GetToolBar(i)->EnableDisableButtons();
1867  }
1868 
1869  // These don't really belong here, but it's easier and especially so for
1870  // the Edit toolbar and the sync-lock menu item.
1871  bool active;
1872  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/SoundActivatedRecord"),&active, false);
1873  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("SoundActivation"), active);
1874 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_AUTOMATED_INPUT_LEVEL_ADJUSTMENT
1875  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/AutomatedInputLevelAdjustment"),&active, false);
1876  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("AutomatedInputLevelAdjustmentOnOff"), active);
1877 #endif
1878  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/Duplex"),&active, true);
1879  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("Duplex"), active);
1880  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/SWPlaythrough"),&active, false);
1881  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("SWPlaythrough"), active);
1882  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/GUI/SyncLockTracks"), &active, false);
1883  SetSyncLock(active);
1884  mCommandManager.Check(wxT("SyncLock"), active);
1885 }
1886 
1887 // checkActive is a temporary hack that should be removed as soon as we
1888 // get multiple effect preview working
1889 void AudacityProject::UpdateMenus(bool checkActive)
1890 {
1891  //ANSWER-ME: Why UpdateMenus only does active project?
1892  //JKC: Is this test fixing a bug when multiple projects are open?
1893  //so that menu states work even when different in different projects?
1894  if (this != GetActiveProject())
1895  return;
1896 
1897  if (checkActive && !IsActive())
1898  return;
1899 
1900  wxUint32 flags = GetUpdateFlags();
1901  wxUint32 flags2 = flags;
1902 
1903  // We can enable some extra items if we have select-all-on-none.
1904  //EXPLAIN-ME: Why is this here rather than in GetUpdateFlags()?
1905  if (mSelectAllOnNone)
1906  {
1907  if ((flags & TracksExistFlag) != 0)
1908  {
1909  flags2 |= TracksSelectedFlag;
1910  if ((flags & WaveTracksExistFlag) != 0 )
1911  {
1912  flags2 |= TimeSelectedFlag
1913  | WaveTracksSelectedFlag
1914  | CutCopyAvailableFlag;
1915  }
1916  }
1917  }
1918 
1919  // Return from this function if nothing's changed since
1920  // the last time we were here.
1921  if (flags == mLastFlags)
1922  return;
1923  mLastFlags = flags;
1924 
1925  mCommandManager.EnableUsingFlags(flags2 , 0xFFFFFFFF);
1926 
1927  // With select-all-on-none, some items that we don't want enabled may have
1928  // been enabled, since we changed the flags. Here we manually disable them.
1929  if (mSelectAllOnNone)
1930  {
1931  if ((flags & TracksSelectedFlag) == 0)
1932  {
1933  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("SplitCut"), false);
1934 
1935  if ((flags & WaveTracksSelectedFlag) == 0)
1936  {
1937  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Split"), false);
1938  }
1939  if ((flags & TimeSelectedFlag) == 0)
1940  {
1941  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("ExportSel"), false);
1942  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("SplitNew"), false);
1943  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Trim"), false);
1944  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("SplitDelete"), false);
1945  }
1946  }
1947  }
1948 
1949 #if 0
1950  if (flags & CutCopyAvailableFlag) {
1951  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Copy"), true);
1952  mCommandManager.Enable(wxT("Cut"), true);
1953  }
1954 #endif
1955 
1956  ModifyToolbarMenus();
1957 }
1958 
1959 //
1960 // Tool selection commands
1961 //
1962 
1963 void AudacityProject::SetTool(int tool)
1964 {
1965  ToolsToolBar *toolbar = GetToolsToolBar();
1966  if (toolbar) {
1967  toolbar->SetCurrentTool(tool, true);
1968  mTrackPanel->Refresh(false);
1969  }
1970 }
1971 
1972 void AudacityProject::OnSelectTool()
1973 {
1974  SetTool(selectTool);
1975 }
1976 
1977 void AudacityProject::OnZoomTool()
1978 {
1979  SetTool(zoomTool);
1980 }
1981 
1982 void AudacityProject::OnEnvelopeTool()
1983 {
1984  SetTool(envelopeTool);
1985 }

1987 void AudacityProject::OnTimeShiftTool()
1988 {
1989  SetTool(slideTool);
1990 }

1993 {
1994  SetTool(drawTool);
1995 }

1998 {
1999  SetTool(multiTool);
2000 }
2001 
2002 
2003 void AudacityProject::OnNextTool()
2004 {
2005  ToolsToolBar *toolbar = GetToolsToolBar();
2006  if (toolbar) {
2007  // Use GetDownTool() here since GetCurrentTool() can return a value that
2008  // doesn't represent the real tool if the Multi-tool is being used.
2009  toolbar->SetCurrentTool((toolbar->GetDownTool()+1)%numTools, true);
2010  mTrackPanel->Refresh(false);
2011  }
2012 }
2013 
2014 void AudacityProject::OnPrevTool()
2015 {
2016  ToolsToolBar *toolbar = GetToolsToolBar();
2017  if (toolbar) {
2018  // Use GetDownTool() here since GetCurrentTool() can return a value that
2019  // doesn't represent the real tool if the Multi-tool is being used.
2020  toolbar->SetCurrentTool((toolbar->GetDownTool()+(numTools-1))%numTools, true);
2021  mTrackPanel->Refresh(false);
2022  }
2023 }
2024 
2025 
2026 //
2027 // Audio I/O Commands
2028 //
2029 
2030 // TODO: Should all these functions which involve
2031 // the toolbar actually move into ControlToolBar?
2032 
2037 bool AudacityProject::MakeReadyToPlay(bool loop, bool cutpreview)
2038 {
2039  ControlToolBar *toolbar = GetControlToolBar();
2040  wxCommandEvent evt;
2041 
2042  // If this project is playing, stop playing
2043  if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive(GetAudioIOToken())) {
2044  toolbar->SetPlay(false); //Pops
2045  toolbar->SetStop(true); //Pushes stop down
2046  toolbar->OnStop(evt);
2047 
2048  ::wxMilliSleep(100);
2049  }
2050 
2051  // If it didn't stop playing quickly, or if some other
2052  // project is playing, return
2053  if (gAudioIO->IsBusy())
2054  return false;
2055 
2056  toolbar->SetPlay(true, loop, cutpreview);
2057  toolbar->SetStop(false);
2058 
2059  return true;
2060 }
2061 
2062 void AudacityProject::OnPlayOneSecond()
2063 {
2064  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2065  return;
2066 
2067  double pos = mTrackPanel->GetMostRecentXPos();
2068  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay;
2069  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion
2070  (SelectedRegion(pos - 0.5, pos + 0.5), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2071 }
2072 
2073 
2081 void AudacityProject::OnPlayToSelection()
2082 {
2083  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2084  return;
2085 
2086  double pos = mTrackPanel->GetMostRecentXPos();
2087 
2088  double t0,t1;
2089  // check region between pointer and the nearest selection edge
2090  if (fabs(pos - mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0()) <
2091  fabs(pos - mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1())) {
2092  t0 = t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2093  } else {
2094  t0 = t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2095  }
2096  if( pos < t1)
2097  t0=pos;
2098  else
2099  t1=pos;
2100 
2101  // JKC: oneSecondPlay mode disables auto scrolling
2102  // On balance I think we should always do this in this function
2103  // since you are typically interested in the sound EXACTLY
2104  // where the cursor is.
2105  // TODO: have 'playing attributes' such as 'with_autoscroll'
2106  // rather than modes, since that's how we're now using the modes.
2107  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay;
2108 
2109  // An alternative, commented out below, is to disable autoscroll
2110  // only when playing a short region, less than or equal to a second.
2111 // mLastPlayMode = ((t1-t0) > 1.0) ? normalPlay : oneSecondPlay;
2112 
2113  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion
2114  (SelectedRegion(t0, t1), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2115 }
2116 
2117 // The next 4 functions provide a limited version of the
2118 // functionality of OnPlayToSelection() for keyboard users
2119 
2120 void AudacityProject::OnPlayBeforeSelectionStart()
2121 {
2122  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2123  return;
2124 
2125  double t0 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2126  double beforeLen;
2127  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewBeforeLen"), &beforeLen, 2.0);
2128 
2129  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2130 
2131  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0 - beforeLen, t0), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2132 }
2133 
2134 void AudacityProject::OnPlayAfterSelectionStart()
2135 {
2136  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2137  return;
2138 
2139  double t0 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2140  double t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2141  double afterLen;
2142  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewAfterLen"), &afterLen, 1.0);
2143 
2144  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2145 
2146  if ( t1 - t0 > 0.0 && t1 - t0 < afterLen )
2147  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0, t1), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2148  else
2149  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0, t0 + afterLen), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2150 }
2151 
2152 void AudacityProject::OnPlayBeforeSelectionEnd()
2153 {
2154  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2155  return;
2156 
2157  double t0 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2158  double t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2159  double beforeLen;
2160  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewBeforeLen"), &beforeLen, 2.0);
2161 
2162  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2163 
2164  if ( t1 - t0 > 0.0 && t1 - t0 < beforeLen )
2165  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0, t1), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2166  else
2167  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t1 - beforeLen, t1), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2168 }
2169 
2170 
2171 void AudacityProject::OnPlayAfterSelectionEnd()
2172 {
2173  if( !MakeReadyToPlay() )
2174  return;
2175 
2176  double t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2177  double afterLen;
2178  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewAfterLen"), &afterLen, 1.0);
2179 
2180  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2181 
2182  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t1, t1 + afterLen), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2183 }
2184 
2185 void AudacityProject::OnPlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionStart()
2186 {
2187  if (!MakeReadyToPlay())
2188  return;
2189 
2190  double t0 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2191  double t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2192  double beforeLen;
2193  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewBeforeLen"), &beforeLen, 2.0);
2194  double afterLen;
2195  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewAfterLen"), &afterLen, 1.0);
2196 
2197  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2198 
2199  if ( t1 - t0 > 0.0 && t1 - t0 < afterLen )
2200  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0 - beforeLen, t1), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2201  else
2202  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0 - beforeLen, t0 + afterLen), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2203 }
2204 
2205 void AudacityProject::OnPlayBeforeAndAfterSelectionEnd()
2206 {
2207  if (!MakeReadyToPlay())
2208  return;
2209 
2210  double t0 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t0();
2211  double t1 = mViewInfo.selectedRegion.t1();
2212  double beforeLen;
2213  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewBeforeLen"), &beforeLen, 2.0);
2214  double afterLen;
2215  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/CutPreviewAfterLen"), &afterLen, 1.0);
2216 
2217  mLastPlayMode = oneSecondPlay; // this disables auto scrolling, as in OnPlayToSelection()
2218 
2219  if ( t1 - t0 > 0.0 && t1 - t0 < beforeLen )
2220  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t0, t1 + afterLen), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2221  else
2222  GetControlToolBar()->PlayPlayRegion(SelectedRegion(t1 - beforeLen, t1 + afterLen), GetDefaultPlayOptions());
2223 }
2224 
2225 
2226 void AudacityProject::OnPlayLooped()
2227 {
2228  if( !MakeReadyToPlay(true) )
2229  return;
2230 
2231  // Now play in a loop
2232  // Will automatically set mLastPlayMode
2233  GetControlToolBar()->PlayCurrentRegion(true);
2234 }
2235 
2236 void AudacityProject::OnPlayCutPreview()
2237 {
2238  if ( !MakeReadyToPlay(false, true) )
2239  return;
2240 
2241  // Play with cut preview
2242  GetControlToolBar()->PlayCurrentRegion(false, true);
2243 }
2244 
2245 void AudacityProject::OnPlayStop()
2246 {
2247  ControlToolBar *toolbar = GetControlToolBar();
2248 
2249  //If this project is playing, stop playing, make sure everything is unpaused.
2250  if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive(GetAudioIOToken())) {
2251  toolbar->SetPlay(false); //Pops
2252  toolbar->SetStop(true); //Pushes stop down
2253  toolbar->StopPlaying();
2254  }
2255  else if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive()) {
2256  //If this project isn't playing, but another one is, stop playing the old and start the NEW.
2257 
2258  //find out which project we need;
2259  AudacityProject* otherProject = NULL;
2260  for(unsigned i=0; i<gAudacityProjects.GetCount(); i++) {
2261  if(gAudioIO->IsStreamActive(gAudacityProjects[i]->GetAudioIOToken())) {
2262  otherProject=gAudacityProjects[i];
2263  break;
2264  }
2265  }
2266 
2267  //stop playing the other project
2268  if(otherProject) {
2269  ControlToolBar *otherToolbar = otherProject->GetControlToolBar();
2270  otherToolbar->SetPlay(false); //Pops
2271  otherToolbar->SetStop(true); //Pushes stop down
2272  otherToolbar->StopPlaying();
2273  }
2274 
2275  //play the front project
2276  if (!gAudioIO->IsBusy()) {
2277  //update the playing area
2278  TP_DisplaySelection();
2279  //Otherwise, start playing (assuming audio I/O isn't busy)
2280  //toolbar->SetPlay(true); // Not needed as done in PlayPlayRegion.
2281  toolbar->SetStop(false);
2282 
2283  // Will automatically set mLastPlayMode
2284  toolbar->PlayCurrentRegion(false);
2285  }
2286  }
2287  else if (!gAudioIO->IsBusy()) {
2288  //Otherwise, start playing (assuming audio I/O isn't busy)
2289  //toolbar->SetPlay(true); // Not needed as done in PlayPlayRegion.
2290  toolbar->SetStop(false);
2291 
2292  // Will automatically set mLastPlayMode
2293  toolbar->PlayCurrentRegion(false);
2294  }
2295 }
2296 
2297 void AudacityProject::OnStop()
2298 {
2299  wxCommandEvent evt;
2300 
2301  if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive())
2302  GetControlToolBar()->OnStop(evt);
2303 }
2304 
2305 void AudacityProject::OnPause()
2306 {
2307  wxCommandEvent evt;
2308 
2309  GetControlToolBar()->OnPause(evt);
2310 }
2311 
2312 void AudacityProject::OnRecord()
2313 {
2314  wxCommandEvent evt;
2315  evt.SetInt(2); // 0 is default, use 1 to set shift on, 2 to clear it
2316 
2317  GetControlToolBar()->OnRecord(evt);
2318 }
2319 
2320 void AudacityProject::OnRecordAppend()
2321 {
2322  wxCommandEvent evt;
2323  evt.SetInt(1); // 0 is default, use 1 to set shift on, 2 to clear it
2324 
2325  GetControlToolBar()->OnRecord(evt);
2326 }
2327 
2328 // The code for "OnPlayStopSelect" is simply the code of "OnPlayStop" and "OnStopSelect" merged.
2329 void AudacityProject::OnPlayStopSelect()
2330 {
2331  wxCommandEvent evt;
2332  ControlToolBar *toolbar = GetControlToolBar();
2333 
2334  //If busy, stop playing, make sure everything is unpaused.
2335  if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive(GetAudioIOToken())) {
2336  toolbar->SetPlay(false); //Pops
2337  toolbar->SetStop(true); //Pushes stop down
2338  mViewInfo.selectedRegion.setT0(gAudioIO->GetStreamTime(), false);
2339  ModifyState(false); // without bWantsAutoSave
2340  toolbar->OnStop(evt);
2341  }
2342  else if (!gAudioIO->IsBusy()) {
2343  //Otherwise, start playing (assuming audio I/O isn't busy)
2344  //toolbar->SetPlay(true); // Not needed as set in PlayPlayRegion()
2345  toolbar->SetStop(false);
2346 
2347  // Will automatically set mLastPlayMode
2348  toolbar->PlayCurrentRegion(false);
2349  }
2350 }
2351 
2352 void AudacityProject::OnStopSelect()
2353 {
2354  wxCommandEvent evt;
2355 
2356  if (gAudioIO->IsStreamActive()) {
2357  mViewInfo.selectedRegion.setT0(gAudioIO->GetStreamTime(), false);
2358  GetControlToolBar()->OnStop(evt);
2359  ModifyState(false); // without bWantsAutoSave
2360  }
2361 }
2362 
2363 void AudacityProject::OnToggleSoundActivated()
2364 {
2365  bool pause;
2366  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/SoundActivatedRecord"), &pause, false);
2367  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/AudioIO/SoundActivatedRecord"), !pause);
2368  gPrefs->Flush();
2369  ModifyAllProjectToolbarMenus();
2370 }
2371 
2372 void AudacityProject::OnTogglePlayRecording()
2373 {
2374  bool Duplex;
2375  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/Duplex"), &Duplex, true);
2376  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/AudioIO/Duplex"), !Duplex);
2377  gPrefs->Flush();
2378  ModifyAllProjectToolbarMenus();
2379 }
2380 
2381 void AudacityProject::OnToggleSWPlaythrough()
2382 {
2383  bool SWPlaythrough;
2384  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/SWPlaythrough"), &SWPlaythrough, false);
2385  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/AudioIO/SWPlaythrough"), !SWPlaythrough);
2386  gPrefs->Flush();
2387  ModifyAllProjectToolbarMenus();
2388 }
2389 
2390 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_AUTOMATED_INPUT_LEVEL_ADJUSTMENT
2391 void AudacityProject::OnToogleAutomatedInputLevelAdjustment()
2392 {
2393  bool AVEnabled;
2394  gPrefs->Read(wxT("/AudioIO/AutomatedInputLevelAdjustment"), &AVEnabled, false);
2395  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/AudioIO/AutomatedInputLevelAdjustment"), !AVEnabled);
2396  gPrefs->Flush();
2397  ModifyAllProjectToolbarMenus();
2398 }
2399 #endif
2400 
2401 double AudacityProject::GetTime(Track *t)
2402 {
2403  double stime = 0.0;
2404 
2405  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Wave) {
2406  WaveTrack *w = (WaveTrack *)t;
2407  stime = w->GetEndTime();
2408 
2409  WaveClip *c;
2410  int ndx;
2411  for (ndx = 0; ndx < w->GetNumClips(); ndx++) {
2412  c = w->GetClipByIndex(ndx);
2413  if (c->GetNumSamples() == 0)
2414  continue;
2415  if (c->GetStartTime() < stime) {
2416  stime = c->GetStartTime();
2417  }
2418  }
2419  }
2420  else if (t->GetKind() == Track::Label) {
2421  LabelTrack *l = (LabelTrack *)t;
2422  stime = l->GetStartTime();
2423  }
2424 
2425  return stime;
2426 }
2427 
2428 //sort based on flags. see Project.h for sort flags
2429 void AudacityProject::SortTracks(int flags)
2430 {
2431  int ndx = 0;
2432  int cmpValue;
2433  wxArrayPtrVoid arr;
2434  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
2435  Track *track = iter.First();
2436  bool lastTrackLinked = false;
2437  //sort by linked tracks. Assumes linked track follows owner in list.
2438  while (track) {
2439  if(lastTrackLinked) {
2440  //insert after the last track since this track should be linked to it.
2441  ndx++;
2442  }
2443  else {
2444  for (ndx = 0; ndx < (int)arr.GetCount(); ndx++) {
2445  if(flags & kAudacitySortByName){
2446  //do case insensitive sort - cmpNoCase returns less than zero if the string is 'less than' its argument
2447  //also if we have case insensitive equality, then we need to sort by case as well
2448  //We sort 'b' before 'B' accordingly. We uncharacteristically use greater than for the case sensitive
2449  //compare because 'b' is greater than 'B' in ascii.
2450  cmpValue = track->GetName().CmpNoCase(((Track *) arr[ndx])->GetName());
2451  if (cmpValue < 0 ||
2452  (0 == cmpValue && track->GetName().CompareTo(((Track *) arr[ndx])->GetName()) > 0) )
2453  break;
2454  }
2455  //sort by time otherwise
2456  else if(flags & kAudacitySortByTime){
2457  //we have to search each track and all its linked ones to fine the minimum start time.
2458  double time1,time2,tempTime;
2459  Track* tempTrack;
2460  int candidatesLookedAt;
2461 
2462  candidatesLookedAt = 0;
2463  tempTrack = track;
2464  time1=time2=std::numeric_limits<double>::max(); //TODO: find max time value. (I don't think we have one yet)
2465  while(tempTrack){
2466  tempTime = GetTime(tempTrack);
2467  time1 = time1<tempTime? time1:tempTime;
2468  if(tempTrack->GetLinked())
2469  tempTrack = tempTrack->GetLink();
2470  else
2471  tempTrack = NULL;
2472  }
2473 
2474  //get candidate's (from sorted array) time
2475  tempTrack = (Track *) arr[ndx];
2476  while(tempTrack){
2477  tempTime = GetTime(tempTrack);
2478  time2 = time2<tempTime? time2:tempTime;
2479  if(tempTrack->GetLinked() && (ndx+candidatesLookedAt < (int)arr.GetCount()-1) ) {
2480  candidatesLookedAt++;
2481  tempTrack = (Track*) arr[ndx+candidatesLookedAt];
2482  }
2483  else
2484  tempTrack = NULL;
2485  }
2486 
2487  if (time1 < time2)
2488  break;
2489 
2490  ndx+=candidatesLookedAt;
2491  }
2492  }
2493  }
2494  arr.Insert(track, ndx);
2495 
2496  lastTrackLinked = track->GetLinked();
2497  track = iter.RemoveCurrent();
2498  }
2499 
2500  for (ndx = 0; ndx < (int)arr.GetCount(); ndx++) {
2501  mTracks->Add((Track *)arr[ndx]);
2502  }
2503 }
2504 
2505 void AudacityProject::OnSortTime()
2506 {
2507  SortTracks(kAudacitySortByTime);
2508 
2509  PushState(_("Tracks sorted by time"), _("Sort by Time"));
2510 
2511  mTrackPanel->Refresh(false);
2512 }
2513 
2514 void AudacityProject::OnSortName()
2515 {
2516  SortTracks(kAudacitySortByName);
2517 
2518  PushState(_("Tracks sorted by name"), _("Sort by Name"));
2519 
2520  mTrackPanel->Refresh(false);
2521 }
2522
